doc:
Bill Cody Jr. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bill_Cody_Jr. 0 Bill Cody Jr. (April 18, 1925 – August 11, 1989) was an American motion picture child actor. Born William Joseph Cody Jr. in Los Angeles, California, where his father Bill Cody was a cowboy star of B-movie westerns, the youngster was reportedly 7 years old when he accompanied his father on a personal appearance tour throughout the United States. Bill Cody Jr. was nine years old when he began appearing in films, the first four of which were with his father. Bill_Cody_Jr. ( April_18_,_1925 – August_11_,_1989 ) was an_American_motion_picture_child_actor . Born William_Joseph_Cody_Jr. in Los_Angeles , California , where his_father_Bill_Cody was a_cowboy_star of B-movie_westerns , the_youngster was reportedly_7_years old when he accompanied his_father on a_personal_appearance_tour throughout the_United_States . Bill_Cody_Jr. was nine_years old when he began_appearing in films , the_first_four of which were with his_father .
